Tavatron:

Tavatron staggers to her feet, mech-fluid leaking from her chest wound. She 
instinctively covers the wound, trying to stop the flow of mech-fluid. 
Tavatron looks up in time to see Dinobot take the acid meant for her:

"Dinobot!" Tavatron snarls at Mosquitor, her eyes glowing a deep crimson 
red:

"You slaggin' Pred!" Tavatron watches as Dinobot fires on Mosquitor *(just 
describin' previous e-mails, not modin' or anythin'). She growls menacingly 
at Mosquitor as he fires more acid *(still describin' previous e-mails, not 
modin').

*(Now I'm not describin' previous e-mails):

Tavatron grabs the other half of her staff and stands in front of Dinobot. 
He had already taken two hits, who knows what another one would do. She 
raised her staff and used the energon blade to block some of the acid. 
Unfortuneatly she wasn't fast enough.

Tavatron falls back against Dinobot as some of Mosquitor's acid connects 
with her chest wound. Tavatron screamed, the pain was too much! The acid 
didn't even have to burn through her armor, BrightBlade had made sure of 
that.
